data.actual_result: The button turns grey before doing the animation to vanish
data.expected_result: The button goes away after you reach the server, without changing color
data.short_description: The "new mention" button on the server list turns grey before vanishing when you click on it
data.steps_to_repro: - be part of a lot of servers so you can scroll through them - get mentioned in one of them and make sure the server is out of view - click on the red "new mention" button that scrolls the server list to the server you were mentioned in - observe
